The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 May is 42,032 (4,864.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 May, there were 111 new confirmed cases (12.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 April, there were 133 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (22 fewer cases).
